body:
https://github.com/Jiaming-Liu/pytorch-misc/blob/master/test_binary_cross_entropy.ipynb

This might be helpful for debugging the loss. Just change loss definition in cell [2] and this should work.

https://github.com/Jiaming-Liu/pytorch-misc/blob/master/sigmoid_with_binary_cross_entropy.py

This is my personal fix of BCE+logit issue.
